titlStmt.titl: Soundscape Another Potpourri, Musical Horns of the "Burnaco" 7'20" (Van116B3)

useStmt.confDec: None required for research not involving human subjects. Note: recordings in this collection are archival. Confidentiality does not apply as this was not a research project with human subjects. However, some recordings may contain human voices. Please use respectfully, and where needed obtain your own research ethics for secondary documentary research.

method.notes: recordist is waiting on the beach for the boat to pass by with the music
